knimeNode.name: Microbial Data Editor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Add assay conditions to microbial data

fullDescription.intro: This node is designed to add information to previously loaded microbial data. For example, not all available information in the ComBase can be exported to a CSV file. Also data from the database or from an XLS file may not contain all necessary information. The Microbial Data Editor allows to add columns containing additional conditions.
fullDescription.option: Click 'Add' to enter the database and choose one or more additional conditions. They will be listed in the white box below the add button and they will also appear as headline of an empty column next to the ID. Here, the values for the condition can be typed in. To delete an assay condition highlight it in the white box and click 'Remove'.

ports.inPort: Microbial data from spreadsheets (via ComBase Reader or XLS Microbial Data Reader) or from a database (via Microbial Data Reader)
